code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function EventList(){const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/events/`).then(response=>{setEvents(response.data);setLoading(false);}).catch(error=>{setError(error.message);setLoading(false);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/events/${event.id}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:event.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Available tickets: ",event.available_tickets]})]},event.id))})});}export default EventList;
